# getAllDetectedExtensions() function

Return all the detected extensions in the abi

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getAllDetectedExtensions(
  abi: AbiInput,
): ExtensionWithEnabled[];
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type     | Description                 |
| --------- | -------- | --------------------------- |
| abi       | AbiInput | parsed array of abi entries |

**Returns:**

[ExtensionWithEnabled](./sdk.extensionwithenabled.md)\[\]

array of all detected extensions with full information on each feature
